overview_of_class: Review of trigonometric substitutions and partial fractions. Improper integrals. Applications of integration: computation of arc length and surface area, work, and probability. Sequences and series: the integral and comparison tests, alternating series, power series, ratio test. Taylor's formula and Taylor series. Series solutions of differential equations. Students may not receive credit for both 214 and 224. Prerequisite: 213 or consent of department.
name: Single Variable Calculus III
subject: MATH
